Key.Original: You need to type what you want to report!
Key.Portuguese: Você precisa digitar o que você quer reportar!
Key.German: Sie müssen eingeben, was Sie melden möchten!

Key.Original: Invalid character typed in a text field...
Key.Portuguese: Caracter inválido digitado em um dos campos...
Key.German: In einem der Felder wurde ein ungültiges Zeichen eingegeben...

Key.Original: You must wait %1min to report something again...
Key.Portuguese: Você precisa aguardar %1min para reportar alguma coisa novamente...
Key.German: Sie müssen %1min warten, um erneut etwas zu melden...

Key.Original: We thank you for your help and we will fix this bug as soon as possible!
Key.Portuguese: Agradecemos pela ajuda e corrigiremos esse bug o mais rápido possível!
Key.German: Vielen Dank für Ihre Hilfe und wir werden diesen Fehler so schnell wie möglich beheben!
Versuchen Sie es später noch einmal...

Key.Original: Please, help us tracking bugs on our server and we will work hard to fix your issue!
Key.Portuguese: Por favor, ajude-nos a rastrear bugs em nosso servidor e nós trabalharemos duro para corrigir seu problema!
Key.German: Bitte helfen Sie uns, Fehler auf unserem Server zu verfolgen, und wir werden hart daran arbeiten, Ihr Problem zu beheben!

Key.Original: Explain exactly what happened to you:
Key.Portuguese: Explique exatamente o que aconteceu com você:
Key.German: Erklären Sie genau, was Ihnen passiert ist:

Key.Original: Explain about the expected behavior from what happened:
Key.Portuguese: Explique o que deveria ter ocorrido se não houvesse o bug:
Key.German: Erklären Sie, was hätte passieren sollen, wenn es keinen Fehler gegeben hätte:

Key.Original: WEBSITE: mywebsite.com | TS3: ts3.myts3.com | Discord: discord.com/inviteLink
Key.Portuguese: WEBSITE: mywebsite.com | TS3: ts3.myts3.com | Discord: discord.com/inviteLink
Key.German: WEBSITE: mywebsite.com | TS3: ts3.myts3.com | Discord: discord.com/inviteLink
